title: Ticket #1781: Be able to pass VARS values to subdags?
description:
I'm not sure how important this is, but I'm creating a ticket anyhow. The idea is that you could do something like this: 

  foo.dag:
  Subdag external bar bar.dag
  Vars bar input="xyz"


  bar.dag
  Job baz baz.sub
  Vars baz my_input=$(input)


  baz.sub:
  arguments = $(my_input)
creator: wenger
